沿.definition: along; to follow (a line, tradition etc); to carry on; to trim (a border with braid, tape etc); border; edge

沿例.definition: following the model; according to precedent

沿兒.definition: edge (used directly after a noun, e.g. roadside 馬路沿兒|马路沿儿)

沿江.definition: along the river; the region around the river

沿河土家族自治縣.pinyin: yán hé tǔ jiā zú zì zhì xiàn
沿河土家族自治縣.definition: Yanhe Tujia Autonomous County in Tongren 銅仁市|铜仁市[Tong2ren2 Shi4], Guizhou

沿河縣.definition: Yanhe Tujia Autonomous County in Tongren 銅仁市|铜仁市[Tong2ren2 Shi4], Guizhou

沿海州.definition: coastal region; refers to Russian far east Primorsky Krai

沿灘.definition: Yantan District of Zigong City 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 Shi4], Sichuan

沿灘區.definition: Yantan District of Zigong City 自貢市|自贡市[Zi4 gong4 Shi4], Sichuan

沿用.definition: to continue to use (old methods); to apply as before; according to usage

沿線.definition: along the line (e.g. railway); the region near the line

沿襲.definition: to carry on as before; to follow (an old custom etc)

沿路.definition: along the way; on the way; area beside a road

沿途.definition: along the sides of the road; by the wayside

沿邊.definition: close to the border; along the border

沿邊兒.definition: to trim (border with braid, tape etc)

沿革.definition: evolution of sth over time; course of development; history
